content:
The FHIR Shorthand Sydney Connectathon Orientation meeting will be held (this is a single meeting ... but occurs on different days in different time zones):

  • Tuesday January 21, 5-6 pm Eastern US time (GMT-5)
  • Wednesday, January 22, 9-10 am, Sydney Daylight Time (GMT+11)
    JOIN: https://meet.mitre.org/mkramer/0SM9YVQV
    +1 (781) 271-2020,,9785794# (US) English (United States)
    +1 (703) 983-2020,,9785794# (US) English (United States)
    Conference ID: 9785794
    For more information on the track, see https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-02+FHIR+Shorthand+Track
    Please sign up on the Confluence page if you plan to attend the Connectathon.
@Mark Kramer I can't figure out how to sign up on Confluence. I've filled out Sandy's survey - but can't find anywhere on the page to sign up!
I think you just edit the entire page. If you are signed in, can you see how to get into edit mode?
So like put a comment at the bottom of the page?
Never mind - my name is already on there!

Do you see the pencil (you must be logged in)?
pasted image
Guess my observation/reading skills need work... :joy:
NP. Rick told me you'd be there. But I'm still interested if others can or can't edit the page to add their own names...
Yeah, I can edit - I guess I was looking for something else... Maybe bold the heading for participants to make it easier to see?
Oh - it already is. Well, whatever. So yeah, all good - I can edit it, definitely see the pencil!
There's a link to a survey on this page that you're supposed to complete...
Thanks for the tip, @David Hay
@Mark Kramer Was able to edit and add myself.
